description: Analyze non-branded keyword presence in AI search results and conversational queries

insights.title: Strong coverage in core product keywords
insights.description: Appearing in 71% of queries related to 'AI automation tools' and 'machine learning platforms'

insights.title: Missing from adjacent category queries
insights.description: Low visibility (18%) in related categories like 'data analytics' and 'business intelligence'

issues.title: Weak long-tail keyword coverage
issues.description: Only 22% presence in specific, intent-driven queries despite high search volume

issues.title: Missing from question-based queries
issues.description: Low visibility in 'how to' and 'what is' queries that drive AI assistant responses

recommendations.title: Develop comprehensive FAQ content
recommendations.description: Create detailed Q&A content targeting conversational queries
actionItems: Identify top 100 question-based queries in your niche
Create dedicated FAQ pages with detailed answers
